dcterms:description: TextWorld is a learning environment designed for text-based games, providing a platform for developing and evaluating agents capable of understanding and interacting with text-based environments.
dcterms:title: TextWorld

dcterms:creator: R. Wang
P. Jansen
M.-A. Cˆot´e
P. Ammanabrolu
dcterms:description: ScienceWorld is a dataset designed to evaluate the reasoning capabilities of agents in a context similar to that of a 5th grader, focusing on educational tasks.
dcterms:title: ScienceWorld

dcterms:creator: P. Jansen
M.-A. Cˆot´e
dcterms:description: TextWorldExpress is a high-performance simulation environment for text-based games, capable of running at one million steps per second, enhancing the efficiency of game interactions.
dcterms:title: TextWorldExpress

dcterms:creator: X. Yuan
M.-A. Cˆot´e

R. T. d. Combes
M. Hausknecht
A. Trischler
dcterms:description: The Coin Collector dataset is designed for exploring and generalizing behaviors in text-based games, focusing on counting and collection tasks.
dcterms:title: Coin Collector

dcterms:creator: K. Murugesan

dcterms:description: Text World Common Sense (TWC) is a dataset that challenges agents to utilize common sense knowledge in text-based environments, enhancing their reasoning capabilities.
dcterms:title: TWC (Text World Common Sense)

dcterms:creator: R. Wang
P. Jansen
M.-A. Cˆot´e
P. Ammanabrolu
dcterms:description: The Arithmetic dataset is focused on mathematical reasoning tasks, where agents are required to solve arithmetic problems within text-based game environments.
dcterms:title: Arithmetic

dcterms:creator: R. Wang
P. Jansen
M.-A. Cˆot´e
P. Ammanabrolu
dcterms:description: The MapReader dataset is designed for navigation tasks within text-based games, where agents must utilize maps to optimize their routes.
dcterms:title: MapReader

dcterms:creator: R. Wang
P. Jansen
M.-A. Cˆot´e
P. Ammanabrolu
dcterms:description: The Sorting dataset involves tasks where agents must sort objects based on specific criteria within text-based game environments.
dcterms:title: Sorting
